trans-unit.source: An element that allows you to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: 호스트할 수 있는 요소는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 컨트롤에 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 페이지.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, positions child elements and determines a size for a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref>-derived class.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 구현 된 경우 자식 요소를 배치 하 고 크기를 결정 한 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref>-클래스를 파생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 이 요소는 자신과 자식을 정렬 하는 데 사용 해야 하는 부모 내의 마지막 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual size used.
trans-unit.target: 사용 되는 실제 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's background as an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 앰비언트 속성으로 호스트 컨트롤의 배경을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 이 종속성 속성으로 식별 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty>필드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로이 속성은 업데이트 하기 위해 매핑됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>호스팅된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the Background property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Background 속성 매핑에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [Windows Forms 및 WPF 속성 매핑](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *Brush* See for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *브러시* 참조 XAML 특성 구문에 대 한.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> set to the background color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> 배경색으로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*> to build the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 기본 클래스 구현을 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*>호스팅된 만들려는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*>

trans-unit.source: The parent window's handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: 부모 창 핸들 (HWND)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The window handle for this object.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체에 대 한 창 핸들입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅하는 자식 컨트롤을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Only one child control can be hosted, but Child can have any number of children.
trans-unit.target: 하나의 자식 컨트롤을 호스팅할 수 있습니다 하지만 자식 임의 개수의 자식 가질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The child control cannot be a top-level form.
trans-unit.target: 자식 컨트롤은 최상위 형식 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: If Child is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 자식 이면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, 폼의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>속성이 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage `<` *object* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>` `` ## XAML Values *object* A element (or a possible subclass).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 텍스트 사용 `<` *개체* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>` `` # # XAML 값 *개체* A 요소 (또는 가능한 하위 클래스).

trans-unit.source: *hostedControl* An element that specifies the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: *hostedControl* 호스팅된 지정 하는 요소 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 태그에 사용자 지정 컨트롤에는 일반적으로 xmlns 매핑이 필요 지정할 [XAML 네임 스페이스 및 WPF XAML에 대 한 매핑을 Namespace](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a top-level form as the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 최상위 폼 호스팅된 컨트롤을 할당 하려고 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>속성을 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*> to delete the window containing this object.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*>이 개체를 포함 하는 창을 삭제할.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*>

trans-unit.source: A window handle.
trans-unit.target: 창 핸들입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 이 매개 변수는 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref>, 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Dispose method disposes the base <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: 기본 삭제 Dispose 메서드를 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 사용 하도록 설정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> 열릴 때 모덜리스에서 제대로 작동 하려면 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call the EnableWindowsFormsInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName> is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: EnableWindowsFormsInterop 메서드를 모두로 전달할 때 키보드 메시지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>모덜리스 열릴.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The EnableWindowsFormsInterop method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 열 때 제대로 작동 하려면 모덜리스 폼에 필요한 메시지 필터를 설치 하는 EnableWindowsFormsInterop 메서드 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: You need to call this method only once for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instance.
trans-unit.target: 특정 작업에 대해이 메서드를 한 번만 호출 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>인스턴스.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 컨트롤의 글꼴 패밀리를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 설정은 해당 템플릿에서 매개 변수로 속성을 사용 하는 컨트롤을만 영향을 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: It has no effect on other controls.
trans-unit.target: 다른 컨트롤에 대해 효과가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 이 종속성 속성으로 식별 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty>필드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로이 속성은 업데이트 하기 위해 매핑됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>호스팅된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms 및 WPF 속성 매핑](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *fontFamily* See for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *fontFamily* 참조 XAML 특성 구문에 대 한.

trans-unit.source: The font family used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 컨트롤에서 사용 되는 글꼴 패밀리입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamily*> dependency property.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font size.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 컨트롤의 글꼴 크기를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 이 종속성 속성으로 식별 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty>필드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로이 속성은 업데이트 하기 위해 매핑됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>호스팅된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms 및 WPF 속성 매핑](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0, but smaller than .
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *double* 같고 . 0.0 보다 크거나 같은 값 의 문자열 표현

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 이 값으로 해석 되는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 측정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 문자열은 소수점이 하를 명시적으로 포함 하지 않아야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of 1 is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 1의 값을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The font size used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 컨트롤에서 사용 되는 글꼴 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 컨트롤의 전경색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 이 종속성 속성으로 식별 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty>필드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로이 속성은 업데이트 하기 위해 매핑됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>호스팅된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the Foreground property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 전경 속성 매핑에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [Windows Forms 및 WPF 속성 매핑](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*> to measure the size of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 기본 클래스 구현을 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*>의 크기를 측정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 개체를 적절 한 크기 레이아웃 엔진에 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*>

trans-unit.source: Size constraints in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout are hard constraints.
trans-unit.target: 크기 제약 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 레이아웃 하드 제약 조건이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region.
trans-unit.target: 제약 조건을 초과 된 경우 호스트는 호스트 된 영역 내에서 콘텐츠를 잘라내야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 구현은이 동작을 적용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The available size for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 사용 가능한 크기는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 원하는 크기의는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"> </xref> 에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.

trans-unit.source: Forces the translation of a mapped property.
trans-unit.target: 매핑되는 속성의 번역을 강제로 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calling the OnPropertyChanged method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element has not changed.
trans-unit.target: OnPropertyChanged 메서드를 호출 해야의 로컬 값을 제외한 상위 요소의 속성이 변경 되었음을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>요소 변경 되지 않았습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms 및 WPF 속성 매핑](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Arguments that identify the property that changed as well as providing that property's old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 해당 속성의 이전 및 새 값을 제공 하는 변경 된 속성을 식별 하는 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the desired padding within the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된에서 원하는 안쪽 여백 크기를 지정 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *Thickness* See for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *두께* 참조 XAML 특성 구문에 대 한.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> structure representing the padding pf the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> 호스팅된의 안쪽 여백을 나타내는 구조 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 결정 하는 속성 맵을 가져옵니다 방법의 속성을 설정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 호스팅된 요소에 영향을 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 및 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 기술은 두 개의 유사 하지만 서로 다른 속성 모델을 갖추고 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *속성 매핑* 두 아키텍처 간의 상호 운용을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms 및 WPF 속성 매핑](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> properties to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"> </xref> 매핑하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> 속성의 속성에 호스팅된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Scales the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control, and tracks the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 조정 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 컨트롤을 추적 하는 배율 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls do not support scaling in the same way as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)]컨트롤에 동일한 방식으로 크기 조정을 지원 하지 않습니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, scaling a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 크기 조정 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] 인수 1, 다시 0.5의 요소를 인수 1에서에서 컨트롤에서 컨트롤의 원래 크기를 일반적으로 복구 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [WindowsFormsHost 요소에 대 한 레이아웃 고려 사항](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Override the ScaleChild method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된에 대 한 사용자 지정 크기 조정 동작을 제공 하도록 ScaleChild 메서드를 재정의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The new scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 새 배율 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref> 호스팅된 적용할 배율 인수를 나타내는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 컨트롤의 탭 인덱스를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 이 종속성 속성으로 식별 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty>필드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 폼에 컨트롤 간의 탭 탐색 순서를 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스가 낮은 탭 컨트롤 인덱스가 높은 컨트롤 앞 포커스를 받습니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.
trans-unit.target: 탭 탐색 및 포커스에 대 한 탭 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Forwards focus from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 포커스를 전달 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 호스팅된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element receives a TAB command from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> method, the first eligible control in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>에서 탭 명령을 수신 하는 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>에 적합 한 첫 번째 컨트롤을 메서드, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>포커스를 받을.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: The first control is specified by the `request` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 컨트롤 지정는 `request` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 때 `request` 은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, 동작은 TAB 키를 누를 비슷합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: 때 `request` <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>동작은 SHIFT + TAB을 눌러 유사</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection> ,

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"></xref> that specifies the focus behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"> </xref> 포커스 동작을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a control was activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤이 활성화 되었습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 구현 된 경우 호스트 된 자식도 창의 창 프로세스에 액세스 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Window handle of the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 창의 창 핸들입니다.

trans-unit.source: Message to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: 메시지 처리에 관련 된 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 작은 플래그 등의 정보 저장에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: 메시지 처리에 관련 된 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to reference an object.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체를 참조 하 일반적으로 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Whether events resulting should be marked handled.
trans-unit.target: 처리 이벤트 결과가으로 표시 되어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The window handle of the child window.
trans-unit.target: 자식 창의 창 핸들입니다.
